state.content: You are a helpful assistant.

You are given few useful crafting recipes to craft items in Minecraft. Crafting commands are of the format "craft [target object] using [input ingredients]".
Every round I will give you an observation, you have to respond an action based on the state and instruction. You can "get" an object (ingredients) from the inventory or the environment, look-up the game inventory by "inventory", or "craft" (target) using any of the crafting commands. You can use ONLY these crafting commands provided, do not use your own crafting commands. However, if the crafting command uses a generic ingredient like "planks", you can use special types of the same ingredient e.g. "dark oak planks" in the command instead.
Your response should use the following format:

Thought:
 ... 

Action:
 ...
Ok.

Crafting commands:
craft 8 red terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 red dye
craft 8 green carpet using 8 white carpet, 1 green dye
craft 8 light blue terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 light blue dye
craft 8 black terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 black dye
craft 2 lime dye using 1 green dye, 1 white dye
craft 8 lime terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 lime dye
craft 8 blue terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 blue dye
craft 8 white terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 white dye
craft 8 green stained glass pane using 8 glass pane, 1 green dye
craft 8 orange terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 orange dye
craft 8 green terracotta using 8 terracotta, 1 green dye
